reviews.review: Old but still worth a try. If you want to play Half life  2 i recommend playing it first.
The game didn't actually close, so it was still alive in the background and it gave me 12 hours of play time by accident
It's Half-Life, what else do I have to say?
take half the time each time you play.(physics joke)

This game is great! if you like FPS's, you will like this game. Of course its not going to look very good considering it was made in 1998, but if you don't like the look, them play the game "Black Mesa", its the same as this game, but the visuals are A LOT better. If you do plan on playing Half-Life 2, then play this game first, or Black Mesa, so the story makes sense!

i love old fps but this one hasn't aged well... Stupid AI, boring enemies,annoying enemy placement, weird level design and not enough ammo on certain chapters. I can't really recommend this game to anyone. I hope that hl2 is better.

Amazing game! I have already played it twice and I am having a blast! It is a true classic and when you get bored of the main game you can play on servers or even install mods from a selection of thousands! Great game would recommend!

Muy buen juego.

Historia perfecta, muy completa, se va descubriendo poco a poco todo mientras se juega, te engancha facilmente.

Los niveles estan perfectos, poco a poco aumenta la dificultad de estos agregando nuevos enemigos mas dificiles de derrotar (Mounstros, militares, vehiculos, etc.) y siempre una situacion mas dificil de resolver.
  Variedad de enemigos y armas de todo tipo, armas desde la pistola default hasta una maquina de rayos laser, enemigos desde bichitos a mounstros y tanques indestructibles, muy completo en esa zona tambien.

Los graficos no son nada del otro mundo, son algo malos, pero consideremos que es un juego que tiene sus a√±itos. Igualmente me gustan sus graficos, no seran ultima generacion pero esta toda la ambientacion y demas muy bien adaptado, me encanta. Este juego lo corre practicamente cualquier PC fluido, no consume nada.

El soundtrack es excelente, es el toque que hace que este juego sea muy bueno en todos sus aspectos. Esto junto con la ambientacion y la tematica en general se conllevan muy bien.

Los bugs, no tiene muchos, pero los tiene. Igualmente me sorprende la poca cantidad que hay siendo que como anteriormente mencion√©, es un juego muy viejo. 

El modo multijugador es decente. No hay mucha gente jugando online pero siempre vas a encontrar una partida con gente, muy divertido la verdad pero me quedo con el modo historia.

Yo lo compr√© el juego en oferta, aun asi me atrevo a decir que vale cada centavo de su precio normal. 100% RECOMENDADO, 10/10.

Muy bueno, la historia me parece muy buena y el que puedas saltar muy rapidamente me gusta, ademas es un juego que a cualquier PC actual le puede correr sin problemas, lo unico que no me gusta son los niveles de dificultad, ya que me parecen realmente dificiles xD
everytime i i think it's going to end, it doesn't, so good on them for keeping the player on their toes.
just finished it as im writing this. great game 7.3/10! now i gotta finish the dlcs.

While enjoyable enough for a single run, wouldn't rly recommend it in 2021, unless you really want to find out with your own hands how the story starts. It's jumping movement is terrible and it requires you to platform quite a bit. All the audio is bitcrushed, the audio balancing is non existent, the shooting is alright, the physics engine is a disaster.
 
While it's the granddaddy of a ton  fps games, I'd personally say skip it and play Half life 2, where they figured out how to make a masterpiece that's enjoyable even 16 years later. 

I had fun with it and it's blue shift and opposing force variants, but it's not gonna blow your mind and it's frustrating at times (and not for good reasons).

What can i say, just one of the best games ever made. Just play, and you don't gonna regret.
O que posso dizer, apenas um dos melhores jogos j√° feitos. Apenas jogue, e voc√™ n√£o vai se arrepender.
